013package org.apache.juneau.rest.httppart;
014
015import static java.util.stream.Collectors.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartType.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ArgUtils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ClassUtils.*;
019import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StringUtils.*;
021import java.util.*;
022import java.util.stream.*;
023
024import javax.servlet.http.*;
025
026import org.apache.http.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.http.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.http.header.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.http.part.*;
032import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
033import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
034import org.apache.juneau.rest.*;
035import org.apache.juneau.rest.util.*;
036import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
037
038/**
039 * Represents the parsed form-data parameters in an HTTP request.
040 *
041 * <p>
042 *    The {@link RequestFormParams} object is the API for accessing the HTTP request content as form data.
043 *    It can be accessed by passing it as a parameter on your REST Java method:
044 * </p>
045 * <p class='bjava'>
046 *    <ja>@RestPost</ja>(...)
047 *    <jk>public</jk> Object myMethod(RequestFormParams <jv>formData</jv>) {...}
048 * </p>
049 *
050 * <h5 class='figure'>Example:</h5>
051 * <p class='bjava'>
052 *    <ja>@RestPost</ja>(...)
053 *    <jk>public</jk> Object myMethod(RequestFormParams <jv>formData</jv>) {
054 *
055 *       <jc>// Get query parameters converted to various types.</jc>
056 *       <jk>int</jk> <jv>p1</jv> = <jv>formData</jv>.get(<js>"p1"</js>).asInteger().orElse(0);
057 *       String <jv>p2</jv> = <jv>formData</jv>.get(<js>"p2"</js>).orElse(<jk>null</jk>);
058 *       UUID <jv>p3</jv> = <jv>formData</jv>.get(<js>"p3"</js>).as(UUID.<jk>class</jk>).orElse(<jk>null</jk>);
059 *     }
060 * </p>
061 *
062 * <p>
063 *    Note that this object does NOT take GET parameters into account and only returns values found in the content of the request.
064 * </p>
065 *
066 * <p>
067 *    Some important methods on this class are:
068 * </p>
069 * <ul class='javatree'>
070 *    <li class='jc'>{@link RequestFormParams}
071 *    <ul class='spaced-list'>
072 *       <li>Methods for retrieving form data parameters:
073 *       <ul class='javatreec'>
074 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#contains(String) contains(String)}
075 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#containsAny(String...) containsAny(String...)}
076 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#get(Class) get(Class)}
077 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#get(String) get(String)}
078 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#getAll(String) getAll(String)}
079 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#getFirst(String) getFirst(String)}
080 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#getLast(String) getLast(String)}
081 *       </ul>
082 *       <li>Methods overridding form data parameters:
083 *       <ul class='javatreec'>
084 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#add(NameValuePair...) add(NameValuePair...)}
085 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#add(Part) add(Part)}
086 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#add(String,Object) add(String,Object)}
087 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#addDefault(List) addDefault(List)}
088 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#addDefault(NameValuePair...) addDefault(NameValuePair...)}
089 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#addDefault(String,String) addDefault(String,String)}
090 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#remove(String) remove(String)}
091 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#set(NameValuePair...) set(NameValuePair...)}
092 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#set(String,Object) set(String,Object)}
093 *       </ul>
094 *       <li>Other methods:
095 *       <ul class='javatreec'>
096 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#asQueryString() asQueryString()}
097 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#copy() copy()}
098 *          <li class='jm'>{@link RequestFormParams#isEmpty() isEmpty()}
099 *       </ul>
100 *    </ul>
101 * </ul>
102 *
103 * <ul class='seealso'>
104 *    <li class='jc'>{@link RequestFormParam}
105 *    <li class='ja'>{@link org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.FormData}
106 *    <li class='ja'>{@link org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.HasFormData}
107 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-rest-server.jrs.HttpParts">HTTP Parts</a>
108 * </ul>
109 */
110public class RequestFormParams extends ArrayList<RequestFormParam> {
111
112   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
113
114   private final RestRequest req;
115   private boolean caseSensitive;
116   private HttpPartParserSession parser;
117   private final VarResolverSession vs ;
118
119   /**
120    * Constructor.
121    *
122    * @param req The request creating this bean.
123    * @param caseSensitive Whether case-sensitive name matching is enabled.
124    * @throws Exception Any exception can be thrown.
125    */
126   public RequestFormParams(RestRequest req, boolean caseSensitive) throws Exception {
127      this.req = req;
128      this.caseSensitive = caseSensitive;
129      this.vs = req.getVarResolverSession();
130
131      Map<String,String[]> m = null;
132      Collection<Part> c = null;
133
134      RequestContent content = req.getContent();
135      if (content.isLoaded() || ! req.getHeader(ContentType.class).orElse(ContentType.NULL).equalsIgnoreCase("multipart/form-data"))
136         m = RestUtils.parseQuery(content.getReader());
137      else {
138         c = req.getHttpServletRequest().getParts();
139         if (c == null || c.isEmpty())
140            m = req.getHttpServletRequest().getParameterMap();
141      }
142
143      if (m != null) {
144         for (Map.Entry<String,String[]> e : m.entrySet()) {
145            String name = e.getKey();
146
147            String[] values = e.getValue();
148            if (values == null)
149               values = new String[0];
150
151            // Fix for behavior difference between Tomcat and WAS.
152            // getParameter("foo") on "&foo" in Tomcat returns "".
153            // getParameter("foo") on "&foo" in WAS returns null.
154            if (values.length == 1 && values[0] == null)
155               values[0] = "";
156
157            if (values.length == 0)
158               values = new String[]{null};
159
160            for (String value : values)
161               add(new RequestFormParam(req, name, value));
162         }
163      } else if (c != null) {
164         c.stream().forEach(x->add(x));
165      }
166   }
167
168
169   /**
170    * Copy constructor.
171    */
172   private RequestFormParams(RequestFormParams copyFrom) {
173      req = copyFrom.req;
174      caseSensitive = copyFrom.caseSensitive;
175      parser = copyFrom.parser;
176      addAll(copyFrom);
177      vs = copyFrom.vs;
178   }
179
180   /**
181    * Subset constructor.
182    */
183   private RequestFormParams(RequestFormParams copyFrom, String...names) {
184      this.req = copyFrom.req;
185      caseSensitive = copyFrom.caseSensitive;
186      parser = copyFrom.parser;
187      vs = copyFrom.vs;
188      for (String n : names)
189         copyFrom.stream().filter(x -> eq(x.getName(), n)).forEach(x -> add(x));
190   }
191
192   /**
193    * Sets the parser to use for part values.
194    *
195    * @param value The new value for this setting.
196    * @return This object.
197    */
198   public RequestFormParams parser(HttpPartParserSession value) {
199      this.parser = value;
200      forEach(x -> x.parser(parser));
201      return this;
202   }
203
204   /**
205    * Sets case sensitivity for names in this list.
206    *
207    * @param value The new value for this setting.
208    * @return This object (for method chaining).
209    */
210   public RequestFormParams caseSensitive(boolean value) {
211      this.caseSensitive = value;
212      return this;
213   }
214
215   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
216   // Basic operations.
217   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
218
219   /**
220    * Adds default entries to these parameters.
221    *
222    * <p>
223    * Similar to {@link #set(String, Object)} but doesn't override existing values.
224    *
225    * @param pairs
226    *    The default entries.
227    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
228    * @return This object.
229    */
230   public RequestFormParams addDefault(List<? extends NameValuePair> pairs) {
231      for (NameValuePair p : pairs) {
232         String name = p.getName();
233         Stream<RequestFormParam> l = stream(name);
234         boolean hasAllBlanks = l.allMatch(x -> StringUtils.isEmpty(x.getValue()));
235         if (hasAllBlanks) {
236            removeAll(getAll(name));
237            add(new RequestFormParam(req, name, vs.resolve(p.getValue())));
238         }
239      }
240      return this;
241   }
242
243   /**
244    * Adds default entries to these parameters.
245    *
246    * <p>
247    * Similar to {@link #set(String, Object)} but doesn't override existing values.
248    *
249    * @param pairs
250    *    The default entries.
251    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
252    * @return This object.
253    */
254   public RequestFormParams addDefault(NameValuePair...pairs) {
255      return addDefault(alist(pairs));
256   }
257
258   /**
259    * Adds a default entry to the form data parameters.
260    *
261    * @param name The name.
262    * @param value The value.
263    * @return This object.
264    */
265   public RequestFormParams addDefault(String name, String value) {
266      return addDefault(BasicStringPart.of(name, value));
267   }
268
269   /**
270    * Adds a parameter value.
271    *
272    * <p>
273    * Parameter is added to the end.
274    * <br>Existing parameter with the same name are not changed.
275    *
276    * @param name The parameter name.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
277    * @param value The parameter value.
278    * @return This object.
279    */
280   public RequestFormParams add(String name, Object value) {
281      assertArgNotNull("name", name);
282      add(new RequestFormParam(req, name, stringify(value)).parser(parser));
283      return this;
284   }
285
286   /**
287    * Adds request parameter values.
288    *
289    * <p>
290    * Parameters are added to the end.
291    * <br>Existing parameters with the same name are not changed.
292    *
293    * @param parameters The parameter objects.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
294    * @return This object.
295    */
296   public RequestFormParams add(NameValuePair...parameters) {
297      assertArgNotNull("parameters", parameters);
298      for (NameValuePair p : parameters)
299         if (p != null)
300            add(p.getName(), p.getValue());
301      return this;
302   }
303
304   /**
305    * Adds a parameter value.
306    *
307    * <p>
308    * Parameter is added to the end.
309    * <br>Existing parameter with the same name are not changed.
310    *
311    * @param part The parameter part.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
312    * @return This object.
313    */
314   public RequestFormParams add(Part part) {
315      assertArgNotNull("part", part);
316      add(new RequestFormParam(req, part).parser(parser));
317      return this;
318   }
319
320   /**
321    * Sets a parameter value.
322    *
323    * <p>
324    * Parameter is added to the end.
325    * <br>Any previous parameters with the same name are removed.
326    *
327    * @param name The parameter name.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
328    * @param value
329    *    The parameter value.
330    *    <br>Converted to a string using {@link Object#toString()}.
331    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
332    * @return This object.
333    */
334   public RequestFormParams set(String name, Object value) {
335      assertArgNotNull("name", name);
336      set(new RequestFormParam(req, name, stringify(value)).parser(parser));
337      return this;
338   }
339
340
341   /**
342    * Sets request header values.
343    *
344    * <p>
345    * Parameters are added to the end of the headers.
346    * <br>Any previous parameters with the same name are removed.
347    *
348    * @param parameters The parameters to set.  Must not be <jk>null</jk> or contain <jk>null</jk>.
349    * @return This object.
350    */
351   public RequestFormParams set(NameValuePair...parameters) {
352      assertArgNotNull("headers", parameters);
353      for (NameValuePair p : parameters)
354         remove(p);
355      for (NameValuePair p : parameters)
356         add(p);
357      return this;
358   }
359
360   /**
361    * Remove parameters.
362    *
363    * @param name The parameter names.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
364    * @return This object.
365    */
366   public RequestFormParams remove(String name) {
367      assertArgNotNull("name", name);
368      removeIf(x -> eq(x.getName(), name));
369      return this;
370   }
371
372   /**
373    * Returns a copy of this object but only with the specified param names copied.
374    *
375    * @param names The list to include in the copy.
376    * @return A new list object.
377    */
378   public RequestFormParams subset(String...names) {
379      return new RequestFormParams(this, names);
380   }
381
382   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
383   // Convenience getters.
384   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
385
386   /**
387    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the parameters with the specified names are present.
388    *
389    * @param name The parameter name.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
390    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the parameters with the specified names are present.
391    */
392   public boolean contains(String name) {
393      return stream(name).findAny().isPresent();
394   }
395
396   /**
397    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the parameter with any of the specified names are present.
398    *
399    * @param names The parameter names.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
400    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the parameter with any of the specified names are present.
401    */
402   public boolean containsAny(String...names) {
403      assertArgNotNull("names", names);
404      for (String n : names)
405         if (stream(n).findAny().isPresent())
406            return true;
407      return false;
408   }
409
410   /**
411    * Returns all the parameters with the specified name.
412    *
413    * @param name The parameter name.
414    * @return The list of all parameters with the specified name, or an empty list if none are found.
415    */
416   public List<RequestFormParam> getAll(String name) {
417      return stream(name).collect(toList());
418   }
419
420   /**
421    * Returns all headers with the specified name.
422    *
423    * @param name The header name.
424    * @return The stream of all headers with matching names.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
425    */
426   public Stream<RequestFormParam> stream(String name) {
427      return stream().filter(x -> eq(x.getName(), name));
428   }
429
430   /**
431    * Returns all headers in sorted order.
432    *
433    * @return The stream of all headers in sorted order.
434    */
435   public Stream<RequestFormParam> getSorted() {
436      Comparator<RequestFormParam> x;
437      if (caseSensitive)
438         x = (x1,x2) -> x1.getName().compareTo(x2.getName());
439      else
440         x = (x1,x2) -> String.CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER.compare(x1.getName(), x2.getName());
441      return stream().sorted(x);
442   }
443
444   /**
445    * Returns all the unique header names in this list.
446    * @return The list of all unique header names in this list.
447    */
448   public List<String> getNames() {
449      return stream().map(x -> x.getName()).map(x -> caseSensitive ? x : x.toLowerCase()).distinct().collect(toList());
450   }
451
452   /**
453    * Returns the first parameter with the specified name.
454    *
455    * <p>
456    * Note that this method never returns <jk>null</jk> and that {@link RequestFormParam#isPresent()} can be used
457    * to test for the existence of the parameter.
458    *
459    * @param name The parameter name.
460    * @return The parameter.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
461    */
462   public RequestFormParam getFirst(String name) {
463      assertArgNotNull("name", name);
464      return stream(name).findFirst().orElseGet(()->new RequestFormParam(req, name, null).parser(parser));
465   }
466
467   /**
468    * Returns the last parameter with the specified name.
469    *
470    * <p>
471    * Note that this method never returns <jk>null</jk> and that {@link RequestFormParam#isPresent()} can be used
472    * to test for the existence of the parameter.
473    *
474    * @param name The parameter name.
475    * @return The parameter.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
476    */
477   public RequestFormParam getLast(String name) {
478      assertArgNotNull("name", name);
479      Value<RequestFormParam> v = Value.empty();
480      stream(name).forEach(x -> v.set(x));
481      return v.orElseGet(() -> new RequestFormParam(req, name, null).parser(parser));
482   }
483
484   /**
485    * Returns the last parameter with the specified name.
486    *
487    * <p>
488    * This is equivalent to {@link #getLast(String)}.
489    *
490    * @param name The parameter name.
491    * @return The parameter value, or {@link Optional#empty()} if it doesn't exist.
492    */
493   public RequestFormParam get(String name) {
494      List<RequestFormParam> l = getAll(name);
495      if (l.isEmpty())
496         return new RequestFormParam(req, name, null).parser(parser);
497      if (l.size() == 1)
498         return l.get(0);
499      StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(128);
500      for (int i = 0, j = l.size(); i < j; i++) {
501         if (i > 0)
502            sb.append(", ");
503         sb.append(l.get(i).getValue());
504      }
505      return new RequestFormParam(req, name, sb.toString()).parser(parser);
506   }
507
508   /**
509    * Returns the form data parameter as the specified bean type.
510    *
511    * <p>
512    * Type must have a name specified via the {@link org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.FormData} annotation
513    * and a public constructor that takes in either <c>value</c> or <c>name,value</c> as strings.
514    *
515    * @param <T> The bean type to create.
516    * @param type The bean type to create.
517    * @return The bean, never <jk>null</jk>.
518    */
519   public <T> Optional<T> get(Class<T> type) {
520      ClassMeta<T> cm = req.getBeanSession().getClassMeta(type);
521      String name = HttpParts.getName(FORMDATA, cm).orElseThrow(()->new BasicRuntimeException("@FormData(name) not found on class {0}", className(type)));
522      return get(name).as(type);
523   }
524
525   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
526   // Other methods
527   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
528
529   /**
530    * Converts this object to a query string.
531    *
532    * <p>
533    * Returned query string does not start with <js>'?'</js>.
534    *
535    * @return A new query string, or an empty string if this object is empty.
536    */
537   public String asQueryString() {
538      StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
539      for (RequestFormParam e : this) {
540         if (sb.length() > 0)
541            sb.append("&");
542         sb.append(urlEncode(e.getName())).append('=').append(urlEncode(e.getValue()));
543      }
544      return sb.toString();
545   }
546
547   /**
548    * Makes a copy of these parameters.
549    *
550    * @return A new parameters object.
551    */
552   public RequestFormParams copy() {
553      return new RequestFormParams(this);
554   }
555
556   private boolean eq(String s1, String s2) {
557      if (caseSensitive)
558         return StringUtils.eq(s1, s2);
559      return StringUtils.eqic(s1, s2);
560   }
561
562   @Override /* Object */
563   public String toString() {
564      JsonMap m = new JsonMap();
565      for (String n : getNames())
566         m.put(n, get(n).asString().orElse(null));
567      return m.asJson();
568   }
569}
